activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3460
activity.text:
Comprehensive end-to-end (E2E) testing of the Peer-to-Peer (P2P) OpenSpark Trade App has been successfully completed. The testing covered the entire workflow, including user registration, authentication, asset listing, trade matching, order execution, payment processing, and wallet integration.

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3367
activity.text:
As part of the Winroom session on 4,5,6,7 March, the QA team conducted comprehensive testing of the Spark App, covering functional, UI, and API-related issues. The session lasted 8 hours/day, during which 115+ bugs were identified, documented, and shared with the development team.

Collaborated with Krushna, Aniket, Sanket, Priti, Ajay, Shreya and Rahul for issue resolution. Bug fixing was completed for the dev , staging, prod environment.
